revised_title: Propagation of High-Frequency Electromagnetic Waves in Magnetized Plasma in Curved Space-Time
tldr: This article explores the propagation of high-frequency electromagnetic waves through a magnetized plasma in curved space-time. The authors develop a formalism to describe the propagation of electromagnetic waves in a magnetized plasma embedded in a strong background gravitational field, with applications in astrophysics, such as black holes, neutron stars, and cosmology.
